content: And I was wondering if you could give some perspective on, you mentioned that it's something that can also attract new patients to the doctors, and it's sounding a little bit more like a Dr. Cindy type of ecosystem where the doctors up in the cloud, and with telemedicine and exposing these doctors to new patients, while you did a pretty clean job in comparing yourself to the Livongo and diabetes versus cardiac, could you give something – just give us a flavor for this new concept of ecosystem and maybe compare to some of the peers out there that you see and how you’re different?
